document_data.name: ''Brewmaster's Cudgel''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Brewmaster's cudgel''''' was the [[Enchanted weapon|enchanted]] [[club]] passed from one brewmaster of [[Hanseath]] in [[Myth Drannor]]'s [[Halls of Light]] to the next one.
document_data.Description: Brewmaster's cudgel did not appear special in any way. It was wooden, heavy, worn-out, and knotty.
document_data.Powers: The club's enchantment allowed the wielder of the weapon to deal triple damage when used against the [[undead]].
document_data.History: Before the fall of [[Myth Drannor]], the ''brewmaster's cudgel'' belonged to the last brewmaster of the city, [[Durlin]]. He died wielding the club against the invading [[Army of Darkness]] in the [[Dwarven Dungeons]]. The cudgel changed hands multiple times after the city's fall, being passed along from one creature to another that infested the ruins of the city.
